mapper.insert: insert into tbl_skill_log(member_id, experience_program_id, skill_log_title, skill_log_content) values(#{memberId}, #{experienceProgramId}, #{skillLogTitle}, #{skillLogContent})
mapper.select: select m.id, m.member_name, im.individual_member_level, count(s.id) as skill_log_count from tbl_member m join tbl_individual_member im on m.id = im.id left join tbl_skill_log s on m.id = s.member_id where m.id = #{id}
